In England, in the seven days to 28 April, there were 13,078 new confirmed cases (23.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 21 April, there were 14,141 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 8% (1,063 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 03 May is 3,863,354 (6,863.7 cases per 100,000 population).
